alert.note: Alert for Coastal Brunswick; Coastal New Hanover; Inland Brunswick; Inland New Hanover (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 3:56PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central New Hanover and east central Brunswick Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 355 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Myrtle Grove, or over South Masonboro Island, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wilmington, Carolina Beach, Kure Beach, South Masonboro Island, Snows Cut, North Masonboro Island, Boiling Spring Lakes, Fort Fisher, Myrtle Grove, Silver Lake, Sea Breeze, Masonboro and Mill Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Brunswick; Coastal New Hanover; Inland Brunswick; Inland New Hanover
